document.full_text: worries over the state of the global economic recovery weighed on stock markets monday but the euro managed to claw back some lost ground despite the weekend arrest of dominique strauss-kahn, the head of the international monetary fund.
document.title: world markets dogged by recovery fears
lines_and_colors: worries over the state of the global economic recovery weighed on stock markets monday but the euro managed to claw back some lost ground despite the weekend arrest of dominique strauss-kahn, the head of the international monetary fund.
